title: London, BL, Add. 14567
Homilies of John Chrysostom
Part of Homilies of John Chrysostom

homily entitled Daemones non gubernare mundum
Extract from a homily, showing that the observance of Lent is not sufficient to qualify us for partaking of the holy Eucharist on the great day of the Resurrection of our Lord
Extract from hom. homily ix. on the Gospel of S. Matthew
Hom. Homily viii. on the first Epistle to the Thessalonians

syrTitle: ܫܠܡ ܡܐܡܪܐ ܕܬܠܬܐ ܕܒܗ ܡܒܝܐ ܗܘܐ ܩܕܝܫܐ ܝܘܚܢܢ ܐܦܝܣܩܘܦܐ ܕܩܘܣܛܢܛܝܢܦܘܠܝܣ܇ ܠܐܣܛܓܪܝܘܣ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܬܕܝܘܢ ܗܘܐ
author: John Chrysostom
displayTitleEnglish: London, BL, Add. 14567Homilies of John ChrysostomPart of Homilies of John ChrysostomFive homilies de incomprehensibili Dei naturaThree homilies ad Stagirium a daemone vexatumhomily entitled Daemones non gubernare mundumExtract from a homily, showing that the observance of Lent is not sufficient to qualify us for partaking of the holy Eucharist on the great day of the Resurrection of our LordExtract from hom. homily ix. on the Gospel of S. MatthewHom. Homily viii. on the first Epistle to the ThessaloniansExtract from hom. homily v. on the Gospel of S. Matthew
decorations: The running titles of this manuscript on foll. 9b , 19b , 29b , 39b , and 49b , are ornamented with figures of birds
Birds are also sketched in outline on fol. 1a and 1b .
On fol. 201a there is a rude drawing of a deer.
finalRubrics: ܫܠܡ ܡܐܡܪܐ ܕܬܠܬܐ ܕܒܗ ܡܒܝܐ ܗܘܐ ܩܕܝܫܐ ܝܘܚܢܢ ܐܦܝܣܩܘܦܐ ܕܩܘܣܛܢܛܝܢܦܘܠܝܣ܇ ܠܐܣܛܓܪܝܘܣ ܗ̇ܘ ܕܡܬܕܝܘܢ ܗܘܐ
otherLimit: ܩܕܡܝܬܐ ܕܩܕܝܫܐ ܝܘܗܢܝܣ ܐ . . . ܟܘܪ̈ܣܐ ܦܢܛܕܝ . . .

ܐܙܕܒܢܬ ܕܝܢ ܦܢܩܝܬܐ ܠܟܢܘܫܝܐ ܩܕܝ̣ܫܐ [ܕܩܫܪܝ ܕܒܛܘܪܐ ܫܪܕܐ̣.] ܒܫܢܬ ܬܫܥܡܐܐ ܘܥܣܪܝܢ ܘܬܫܥ. ܒܝ̈ܘܡܝ ܚܣܝܐ ܘܪܚܡ ܐܠܗܐ ܡܪܝ ܓܝܪܓܝ ܩܫܝܫܐ ܘܪܝܫܕܝܪܐ̣. ܘܕܘܝܕ ܩܫܝܫܐ ܕܒܬܪܗ. ܘܝܘܚܢܢ ܩܫܝܫܐ ܘܦܪܢܣܐ ܕܝܠܗ ܕܟܢܘܫܝܐ. ܘܟܠܗ̇ ܐܚܘܬܐ ܕܥܡܗܘܢ̇ ܏ܘܫ ܕܟܠ ܡ̇ܢ ܕܫܩܦܠ ܠܗ̇ ܠܦܢܩܝܬܐ ܗܕܐ ܕܢܩܪܐ ܒܗܦ ܏ܘܫ ܘܠ ܡܦܢܐ ܠܗ̇ ܠܟܢܘܫܝܐ ܩܕܝܫܐ ܕܩܫܪܝ̣. ܬܚܘܬ ܡܠܬܐ ܕܟܠܝܢܐ ܐܝܬܘܗܝ ܥܕܡܐ ܕܡܦܢܐ ܠܗ̇ ܠܕܘܟܬܗ̇܀.
script: syr-Syre syr syr und und und
